item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #436】SRE 周刊 #436
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, FireHydrant: Migrate off of PagerDuty, save money, and then have all of your configuration exported as Terraform modules? We did that. We know one of the hardest parts of leaving a legacy tool is the old configuration, that’s why we dedicated time to build the Signals migrator, […]】在 sreweekly.com 上查看 来自我们的赞助商 FireHydrant 的消息：从 PagerDuty 迁移、省钱，然后将所有配置导出为 Terraform 模块？我们做到了。我们知道离开遗留工具最困难的部分之一是旧配置，这就是为什么我们花时间构建信号迁移器，[...]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #438】SRE 周刊 #438
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com Are there any blind or low-vision readers out there that would be willing to answer a few questions? I’m looking to learn more about your experience of reading a newsletter like this and the articles I link to. If you’re interested, please drop me an email at lex at sreweekly dot com. […]】在 sreweekly.com 上查看 有盲人或弱视读者愿意回答几个问题吗？我希望更多地了解您阅读此类新闻通讯以及我链接到的文章的体验。如果您有兴趣，请给我发送电子邮件至 lex at sreweekly dot com。 […]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #439】SRE 周刊第 #439 期
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, FireHydrant: Migrate off of PagerDuty, save money, and then have all of your configuration exported as Terraform modules? We did that. We know one of the hardest parts of leaving a legacy tool is the old configuration, that’s why we dedicated time to build the Signals migrator, […]】在 sreweekly.com 上查看 来自我们的赞助商 FireHydrant 的消息：从 PagerDuty 迁移、省钱，然后将所有配置导出为 Terraform 模块？我们做到了。我们知道离开遗留工具最困难的部分之一是旧配置，这就是为什么我们花时间构建信号迁移器，[...]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #435】SRE 周刊第 #435 期
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, FireHydrant: We’ve gone all out on our new integration with Microsoft Teams. If you’re a MS Teams user, FireHydrant now supports the most comprehensive integration for incident management. Run the entire IM process without ever leaving the chat. https://firehydrant.com/blog/introducing-a-brand-new-microsoft-teams-integration/ CrowdStrike Preliminary Post Incident Review CrowdStrike released a […]】在 sreweekly.com 上查看 来自我们的赞助商 FireHydrant 的消息：我们已全力以赴与 Microsoft Teams 进行新的集成。如果您是 MS Teams 用户，FireHydrant 现在支持最全面的事件管理集成。无需离开聊天即可运行整个 IM 流程。 https://firehydrant.com/blog/introducing-a-brand-new-microsoft-teams-integration/ CrowdStrike 事件后初步审查 CrowdStrike 发布了 [...]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #437】SRE 周刊第 #437 期
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com This week’s issue is entirely focused on the CrowdStrike incident: more details on what happened, analysis, and learnings. I’ll be back next week with a selection of all of the great stuff you folks have been writing while I’ve been off on vacation for the past two weeks—my RSS reader is packed […]】查看 sreweekly.com 本周的问题完全集中在 CrowdStrike 事件上：有关所发生事件、分析和教训的更多详细信息。下周我会回来，挑选出过去两周我休假期间你们写的所有精彩内容——我的 RSS 阅读器已经挤满了 […]
